divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about midnight on 17th Oct 2006 when i walked out to my verandah which looks directly at mt cootha, brisbane, that i noticed an object moving rapidly from the east of mt coother at about 300 feet above grd level. the only reason i assumed cigar was that there were two white lights at either end and in between was dark. It seemed a lot larger than the craft I have seen previously. It moved at a rapid speed and was by pure luck that i happened to be watching at the right moment. I have noticed more recently that I am present when strange phenomenon are present in the sky. This particular incident made me feel exhilirated and quietly excited. I have seen quite a few strange and unexplained things which I have not reported before as I already believe though thought it was selfish not to share my experiences When i first saw the object I knew immediately it was a ufo as the absence of sound from an object so big and so close, as we live in a valley and the sounds echo from everything!! The object simply moved very fast from over mt cootha towards the city and was gone in five seconds after passing past a palm tree.
Summary: Object was moving rapidly at about 300 feet above grd level. Was cigar shaped and had white lights at either end.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Brisbane
There were no other sightings in Brisbane on or around October 17th 2006
